channel.title: Changing Bank Name in [pi] will rep ++
channel.description:
Okay, ive looked in all the files and i can't find out how to change the bank name.
It says The Bank of Pur3z317
Also the logout message says thanks for Playing Pur3z317.
Can't find it anywhere.
